name: richy
description: Richy is a self-hosted rich text editor for blogs or content management. It supports Markdown, HTML, custom styles, and a simple WYSIWYG UI for publishing entries.
features: WYSIWYG editing: Create content with a visual editor that shows final formatting in real-time.
Markdown support: Write in Markdown for faster content creation with plain text.
HTML editing: Switch to HTML mode for advanced formatting and custom styling.
Custom styles: Apply custom CSS to match your brand or design preferences.
Image uploads: Add images directly to posts with drag-and-drop functionality.
Draft management: Save work in progress and publish when ready.
Content organization: Categorize posts with tags and categories for easy navigation.
Preview mode: See how content will appear before publishing.
Mobile editing: Create and edit content from smartphones and tablets.
Export functionality: Download posts in various formats for backup or migration.
Revision history: Track changes and revert to previous versions if needed.
Simple publishing: Publish content with one click to make it publicly accessible.
